data.name: Come Home - Mari Clothing Expansion
data.detailed_description:
This optional DLC adds 4 new outfits for Mari to wear on dates.

Park Date - Sporty bra and shorts.
Luigi's - Classy black dress
The Pit - Flowing blouse and blue jeans
Movie Theater - Wolf shirt and shorts

These outfits only appear while you are on a date with Mari. In other scenes, she will be wearing her normal outfits.

This DLC is completely optional and not necessary for enjoyment of the game, but was added for those who want to help support the game through Steam. Hope you enjoy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
